description: Section headings checklist extracts heading paragraphs with references to following verses

structure.rowCountVariable: Depends on number of section headings in Genesis 1-5

expectedBehavior.markerDetection: Only paragraph markers with scSection text type are extracted
expectedBehavior.referenceAssignment: Reference is first verse following the heading
expectedBehavior.headingContent: Full text content of the heading paragraph

verificationNotes: Only section heading markers (\s, \s1, \s2, etc.) are extracted
Book title markers (\mt) are NOT included
Reference points to first verse following the heading, NOT the heading itself
If heading is before chapter marker, reference uses previous verse (FB-35863)
Stanza breaks (\b) after headings are skipped when finding reference (FB-24651)
